title: OpenXT Build System
content:
Owned by Ross Philipson Last updated: Sep 25, 2015 by Ross Philipson

Among other things, OpenXT is a distro based on the OpenEmbedded build framework. The basic build documentation can be found in the How to build OpenXT page. This space is for more in depth technical information on the build system.
disclaimer: Users of this benchmark dataset are advised to check Atlassian’s official documentation for the most current information.
